title.rendered: Blending Paper Stumps and Tortillions, Sketch Drawing Tools, Paper Art Blenders for Student Sketch Drawing (Set of 6 pcs)

content.rendered: 6 PCS Blending Stumps and Tortillions Paper Art Blenders for Student Artist Charcoal Sketch Drawing Tools ★- Sketch drawing tool set is a good choice to make better drawing and a good gift for children, students, artists, sketch drawing beginners, learners, etc. It gives you more control of your drawing and allows you to soften lines or smudge shaded areas as you see fit. ★-Stumps are excellent for blending and smoothing pastels, charcoal, graphite and other artwork Double-ended, pointed and made from soft, gray paper felt, stumps are excellent for blending and smoothing pastels, charcoal, graphite or any other dry media. Tortillons are excellent for rapid, thin blending on pencil, charcoal or pastel drawings. Both are easily sharpened with a sandpaper block. Any one who blends art colors should have these. These Paper pens make your shading much easier and more even all around plus, You are not leaving your finger prints on your pictures any more! This set is good gifts for your friends, family and relatives who are learning to sketch. shading stumps they work exactly like they’re supposed to don’t think you will be disappointed with these shading stumps it has a very nice assortment of sizes, ranging from small to large clean up easily

excerpt.rendered:
Paper Stumps for easy blending of art work

6 Different sizes of stumps for small to big size of Blending Needs

Suitable For Fast Mixing And Blending

This Is Made Up Of Durable Compressed Paper
